name: LOCATION DATA
PAYLOAD
info:
GPRMC
GPVTG
GPGGA
GPGSA
GPGSV,3,1
GPGSV,3,2
GPGSV,3,3
GPGLL

https://content.u-blox.com/sites/default/files/products/documents/u-blox7-V14_ReceiverDescriptionProtocolSpec_%28GPS.G7-SW-12001%29_Public.pdf

name: GPVTG = COURSE OVER GROUND AND GROUND SPEED
GPGGA = GLOBAL POSITION SYSTEM FIX DATA *
GPGSA = GNSS DOP AND ACTIVE SATELLITES
GPGLL = LATITUDE AND LONGITUDE,WITH TIME OF POSITION FIX AND DATA
GPGSV,3,[1~3] = GNSS SATELLITE IN VIEW (1 thru 3)
GPGLL
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload.split(",");

msg = [
    { "payload": msg.payload[1], "topic": "LATITUDE" },
    { "payload": msg.payload[2], "topic": "NS" },
    { "payload": msg.payload[3], "topic": "LONGITUDE" },
    { "payload": msg.payload[4], "topic": "EW" },
    { "payload": msg.payload[5], "topic": "TIME" },
    { "payload": msg.payload[6], "topic": "STATUS" },
    { "payload": (msg.payload[7].split("*"))[0], "topic": "POSMODE" },
    { "payload": (msg.payload[7].split("*"))[1], "topic": "CS" },
    { "payload": {"LAT": msg.payload[1], "LON":msg.payload[3]}, "topic": "LAT/LON" },
]

return msg;

//$xxGLL,lat,NS,long,EW,time,status,posMode*cs<CR><LF>

name: CONVERTION
GPGGA
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload.split(",");

msg = [
    { "payload": msg.payload[1], "topic": "TIME" },
    { "payload": msg.payload[2], "topic": "LATITUDE" },
    { "payload": msg.payload[3], "topic": "NS" },
    { "payload": msg.payload[4], "topic": "LONGITUDE" },
    { "payload": msg.payload[5], "topic": "EW" },
    { "payload": msg.payload[6], "topic": "QUALITY" },
    { "payload": msg.payload[7], "topic": "numSV" },
    { "payload": msg.payload[8], "topic": "HDOP" },
    { "payload": msg.payload[9], "topic": "ALT" },
    { "payload": msg.payload[10], "topic": "M" },
    { "payload": msg.payload[11], "topic": "SEP" },
    { "payload": msg.payload[12], "topic": "DiffAge" },
    { "payload": msg.payload[13], "topic": "DiffStation" },
    { "payload": (msg.payload[14].split("*"))[0], "topic": "POSMODE" },
    { "payload": (msg.payload[14].split("*"))[1], "topic": "CS" },
    { "payload": {"ALT":msg.payload[9], "LAT": msg.payload[2], "LON":msg.payload[4]}, "topic": "ALT/LAT/LON" },
]

return msg;

//$xxGLL     ,lat,NS,long,EW,time,status,posMode*cs<CR><LF>
//$xxGGA,time,lat,NS,long,EW,quality,numSV,HDOP,alt,M,sep,M,diffAge,diffStation*cs<CR><LF>

name: UART COMMANDS (RPI Pico)
INDICATORS
CHART CPM EXTRACTOR
CHART uSv EXTRACTOR
SERIAL PORT ASSIGMENTS
